purpose: The QN Department of Administration is using project results to inform QN internship program improvements.
question: What can we learn from applicant and intern data from the State of QN internship program?
deliverable: - Summaries of demographics of applicants; demographics of students offered internships; and recommendations for improvements to the QN internship program.
summary:
The state of QN internship program is an opportunity for Quinetucket students to work in state government agencies. Using demographic data associated with applicants and accepted interns, the QN Department of Administration (QNDOA) studies information to learn about the students who apply to the internship program and the students who are accepted.

You can access the powerpoint [here](https://ncosbm.sharefile.com/d-se498230ec15b4a68bc151836392e5362).
title: Applicant Intern Data
